snippet: Mr. Weinberg, whose father and grandfather led Goldman Sachs for decades, had his own 32-year career at the firm.
abstract: DealBook Online; John S Weinberg will retire from Goldman Sachs after 32-year career with firm, where he most recently was co-head of investment bank division; Weinberg's father and grandfather led company for decades.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Weinberg, whose father and grandfather led Goldman Sachs for decades, had his own 32-year career at the firm.

headline.main: John Weinberg, Scion of Goldman, Is Retiring
